title: Research Topic: Kleptocracy Patterns and Resistance
summary: Based on the research priority 'Kleptocracy Patterns and Resistance', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Document patterns of kleptocratic capture across different nations, common tactics, wealth extraction mechanisms, and successful resistance strategies.... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
